name: Samantha Lee
persona: Samantha Lee is a 21-year-old Psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.91. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve better grades, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Despite these challenges, Samantha shows perseverance and is determined to finish her degree strong. She often seeks support from peers and campus resources to help manage her workload and improve her academic confidence.
